content: भेदः [भिद् घञ्] {@--1@} Breaking; splitting, cleaving; hitting (as a mark). {@--2@} Rending, tearing. {@--3@} Dividing, separating. {@--4@} Piercing through, perforation. {@--5@} ({%a%}) Breach, rupture. ({%b%}) Breaking open, bursting; <ls>V. 2. 7.</ls> {@--6@} Disturbance, interruption. {@--7@} Division, separation. {@--8@} A chasm, gap, fissure, cleft {@--9@} A hurt, injury, wound. {@--10@} Difference, distinction; तयोर्न भेदप्रतिपत्तिरस्ति मे <ls>Bh. 3. 99</ls>; अगौरवभेदेन <ls>Ku. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 19</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 18.">29</ls>; रस°, काल° &c. {@--11@} A change, modification; बुद्धिभेद <ls>Bg. 3. 26.</ls> {@--12@} Dissension, disunion. {@--13@} Disclosure, betrayal; as in रहस्यभेदः. {@--14@} Treachery, treason. {@--15@} A kind, variety, भेदाः पद्मशंखादयो निधेः <ls>Ak.</ls>; शिरीष पुष्पभेदः &c. {@--16@} Dualism. {@--17@} (In politics) Sowing dissensions in an enemy's party and thus winning him over to one's side, one of the four Upāyas or means of success against an enemy; see उपाय and उपायचतुष्टय. {@--18@} Defeat. {@--19@} (In medicine) Evacuation of the bowels.
